code: import React,{Component}from'react';import rpc from'utils/rpc';import withPayment from'components/Common/with-payment';import withRotation from'components/Common/with-rotation';import Appearance from'components/Character/appearance';import GradientButton from'components/Common/gradient-button';import TotalPrice from'components/Common/total-price';import Hint from'components/Common/hint';class Barbershop extends Component{constructor(){super(...arguments);this.state={price:0};}componentDidMount(){this.setState(()=>this.props.location.state);}async buy(payment){const data=await rpc.callClient('Barbershop-GetData');await rpc.callServer('Barbershop-Buy',[data,payment]);}close(){rpc.callClient('Barbershop-CloseMenu');}render(){const{price}=this.state;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"barbershop"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Hint,{className:"character_hint",action:"drag"},"\u041F\u043E\u0432\u043E\u0440\u043E\u0442 \u043F\u0435\u0440\u0441\u043E\u043D\u0430\u0436\u0430"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"barbershop_container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{className:"character_btn",onClick:this.close.bind(this)},"\u041D\u0430\u0437\u0430\u0434"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Appearance,null),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(TotalPrice,{className:"barbershop_price",title:"\u0426i\u043D\u0430:",value:price}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(GradientButton,{onClick:()=>this.props.showPayment(this.buy.bind(this))},"\u041F\u0440\u0438\u0434\u0431\u0430\u0442\u0438")));}}export default withPayment(withRotation(Barbershop));
